description:
Star System: Solar System
Celestial Body: Planet
Planetary Type: Terrestrial
Planetary System: Martian System
Number of Moons: 2

Mass: 6.4171×10^23 kg
Radius: 3389.5 km
Surface Gravity: 3.7208 m/s^2
Orbital Period: 687d
Length of Day: 1d 0h 37m


Description: Mars is the forth planet from the Sun and the second smallest planet in the Solar System. The martian surface is covered in sand and rocks with heavy deposits of iron dioxide giving it a reddish appearance as well as its nickname the "Red Planet". Mars has two small moons, that are considered to be captured asteroids. Mars is also home to the largest mountain in the Solar System Olympus Mons towering at 21.9 km; two and a half times taller than Mount Everest.
